rukus.text: veiz kale ibrahimu liebihi vekavmihi inneni beraum mimma ta`budun
vece`aleha kelimetem bakiyeten fi `akibihi le`allehum yerci`un
bel metta`tu haulai veabaehum hatta caehumu-lhakku verasulum mubin
velemma caehumu-lhakku kalu haza sihruv veinna bihi kafirun
vekalu levla nuzzile haze-lkur'anu `ala raculim mine-lkaryeteyni `azim

ehum yaksimune rahmete rabbik. nahnu kasemna beynehum me`isetehum fi-lhayati-ddunya verafa`na ba`dahum fevka ba`din deracatil liyettehize ba`duhum ba`dan suhriyya. verahmetu rabbike hayrum mimma yecme`un
velevla ey yekune-nnasu ummetev vahidetel lece`alna limey yekfuru birrahmani libuyutihim sukufem min fiddativ veme`arice `aleyha yazherun
vezuhrufa. vein kullu zalike lemma meta`u-lhayati-ddunya. vel'ahiratu `inde rabbike lilmuttekin
